definitions.definition: (of a person) unwilling to talk or impart information.
examples: taciturn, quiet, unforthcoming, reserved, reticent, laconic, tongue-tied, mute, silent, tight-lipped, close-mouthed; Moreguarded, secretive, close, private; distant, remote, aloof, curt, withdrawn, unsociable, farouche; informalmum, standoffish "their uncommunicative dinner guests made the evening seem terribly long"Moreguarded, secretive, close, private; distant, remote, aloof, curt, withdrawn, unsociable, farouche; mum, standoffish their uncommunicative dinner guests made the evening seem terribly long

definitions.definition: (of something such as writing or art) not conveying much or any meaning or sense.
